long.para: char(x) creates a text character string representing the input Clifford object, x.

examples.precode:
>> clifford_signature(1,1) >> x = randm
x =
0.6133 e0 + 0.6223 e1 - 0.4845 e2 + 0.0434 e12
>> class(x)
ans =
clifford
>> x = char(x)
x =
0.6133 e0 + 0.6223 e1 - 0.4845 e2 + 0.0434 e12
>> class(x)
ans =
char
